summary: REQ-79 appears satisfied in the visible portion of the diff: `website` is added to component state but is not used for validation, branching, or submission payload. REQ-78 cannot be fully verified from the truncated diff because the actual rendered input/label placement and `id="website"` are not shown. Additional non-requested metadata/state files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render a visible text input field named `website` with label exactly “Website (leave blank)”, with `id="website"`, placed at the bottom of the form and visually unobtrusive, and ensure no other honeypot/spam fields are present on this page.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows `website` state was added, but the truncated file content does not include the JSX that renders the `website` input/label, its `id`, or its placement at the bottom of the form. The diff also does not provide enough evidence to confirm the absence of other honeypot/spam fields on the page.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/doc files updated (frontend file summaries and overall project state) unrelated to adding a visible `website` field on the public referral page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a UI change in `PublicReferralPage.tsx` (and behavior constraints). Modifying these repository metadata/summary files is not requested by the spec.
